医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
通过3D成像技术增强皮肤癌筛查3D摄影改善黑色素瘤早期发现的潜力是对医学界兴趣越来越多的话题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/enhancing-skin-cancer-screening-with-3d-mimaging-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/enhancing-skin-cancer-screening-with-3d-mimaging-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adf1df7a-0C67-4AE3-8868-AE4EB11D0077 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 03:08:13 -0400 Enhancing skin cancer screening with 3D imaging technology
抑制无系统性毒性的小鼠肿瘤异种移植生长乳腺癌的管理涉及各种治疗方法。但是，许多当前的抗癌治疗措施不加区分损害癌细胞和健康细胞。在癌症治疗中，链霉菌已经被证明是产生抗癌药物的主要资源。 Coelicolor链霉菌是链霉菌属的代表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/ iNHIBETION-of-tumor-xenograft-growth-newognograft-growth-in-in-mice-without-systy-systynic-toxicity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/ iNHIBETION-of-tumor-xenograft-growth-in--in-in-mice-n-mice without-systy-systynic-toxicity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c19ef76-A1CF-4BCC-B632-D04279A39247 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:54:53 -0400 Inhibition of tumor xenograft growth in mice without systemic toxicity
在DMH中揭示瘦素信号传导以产生代谢作用彭宁顿生物医学研究中心的科学家在控制代谢，体温和能量使用的大脑区域和神经元中获得了更大的清晰度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/unveiling-leptin-signaling-in-the-the-dmh-for-metabolic-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/unveiling-leptin-signaling-in-the-the-the-dmh-for-metabolic-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B79954C5-744D-4225-9855-C4EFCF720C27 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:42:05 -0400 Unveiling leptin signaling in the DMH for metabolic effects
对肿瘤微环境和胃癌治疗的新见解一支新加坡科学家团队在理解胃癌方面做出了重大发现，这种疾病仍然是全球最致命的癌症之一。通过使用先进的映射技术，他们创建了一个详细的胃肿瘤“地图集”，从而揭示了癌细胞的表现，发展和与环境相互作用的隐藏模式。这些见解可能会导致更精确，有针对性的治疗方法，以提高存活率并降低副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/novel-insights-into-tumor-microenvironment-and-microenvironment-and-gastrec-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/novel-insights-into-tumor-microenvironment-and-microenvorment-and-gastrec-cancer-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dd533d1-0247-425a-425a-A271-1c043f65d732 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:31:53 -0400 Novel insights into tumor microenvironment and gastric cancer therapy
长期的共同患者报告了医疗保健提供者的解雇和缺乏支持根据萨里大学的一项新研究，长期居住的人经常感到被解雇，不相信和不支持其医疗保健提供者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/long-covid-patients-report-report-dismissal-and-sissal-and-lack-of-support-support-from-healthcare-rom-healthcare-providers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/long-covid-patients-port-port-dismissal-dismissal-and-lack-sun-sup-support-support-from-healthcare-rom-healthcare-roviders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e61df32-3749-467d-9d4e-cad9776f8f97 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:17:19 -0400 Long Covid patients report dismissal and lack of support from healthcare providers
尽管筛查延迟Regenstrief研究所和印第安纳大学医学院的研究人员最近进行的两项研究探讨了大流行对印第安纳州中部大肠癌筛查测试和诊断结肠镜检查的影响。对前者的暂时破坏和对后者的影响最小的发现与美国各地的发现相似，这有助于在大流行期间对预防健康吸收和随后治疗的知识汇编。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/diarostic-colonoscophy-follow-follow-pollow--unbollowed-covid-19-surge-19-surge-defite-defte-deast-screening-delays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/diarostic-colonoscophy-follow-follow-pollow--nocted-by-covid-19-surge-19-surge-delge-defte-deast-screening-screening-delays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd3837c1-f68f-4362-BE12-BE12-A92C5439F1FA Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:10:13 -0400 Diagnostic colonoscopy follow-up unaffected by COVID-19 surge, despite screening delays
小腿肌肉的负刚度增强了高速跳跃东京大学的研究人员揭示了我们的双腿适应快速运动的方式。当人们高速跳跃时，小腿中的关键肌肉纤维会缩短而不是随着力增加而加长，他们称之为“负刚度”。这种违反直觉的过程有助于腿变得更硬，从而使运动更快。这些发现可以改善训练，康复，甚至可以改善假肢或机器人外骨骼的设计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/negative-stiffness-in-calf-muscles-enhances-enhances-high-speed-hopping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/negative-stiffness-in-calf-muscles-enhances-enhances-high-speed-hopping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=387840d6-0d10-4c6d-97d1-86c317f2a5dd Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:01:41 -0400 Negative stiffness in calf muscles enhances high-speed hopping
急性损伤后解锁肝脏再生的谷氨酸钥匙肝脏是重要的器官，对消化，代谢和消除毒素至关重要。它具有独特的能力和再生能力，可以替代这些细胞消除的毒素破坏的肝细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/glutamate-key-to-unlocking-liver-nocking-liver-regeneration-river-regeneration-after-ucute-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/glutamate-key-to-unlocking-liver-nocking-liver-regeneration-regeneration-regeneration-regeneration-after-ucute-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8a8888cf5-efb1-4e82-91aa-91aa-9fdddd334ec49c Wed, 26 Mar 2025 22:56:21 -0400 Glutamate key to unlocking liver regeneration after acute damage
